<!-- Use rProject version when de-anonymized -->

The R project `manCULTA` contains a collection of functions to setup personal R projects. For example, `manCULTA::BuildIgnore()` generates the `.Rbuildignore` for my personal R projects. 

```{r}
#| include: false
library(manCULTA)
library(printr)
```
